## Target.worker() method

If the target is not of type `"service_worker"` or `"shared_worker"`, returns `null`.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
worker(): Promise<WebWorker | null>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[WebWorker](./puppeteer.webworker.md) \| null&gt;
